name: This Website!
description:
Built this interactive REACT front-end website from the ground up, brick by brick, to highlight and house my skills and qualifications. 

Tools include: React.js, JS, Styled-Components, Framer-Motion and EmailJS

name: Full-Stack E-commerce Store
description:
Developed a completely Full-Stack "CRUD" mock up web-store front using Redux, React.JS and Styled-Components. 
Designed to have a smooth user interface. 
Stores user information seamlessly onto external MongoDB Database. 
Deployed on Netlify (frontend) and Render (server).
